What I would do on long term care (LTC) *right now*:  ✔️Not allow covid positive staff to work in LTC homes ✔️Segregate covid positive residents ✔️Issue clear directives for testing ✔️Ensure all health care workers have PPE  More:  https://t.co/4oQ4pzyudX #covid19ontario #onpoli

Following her visit to Seven Oaks last year, NDP MPP @DolyBegum invited the Minister of Long Term Care on a follow-up visit. She didn't attend.  No one predicted #COVID19, but for years we predicted a LTC crisis.   We cannot allow governments to keep neglecting care homes.
